name: Chinese Chess/ Elephant Game: 象棋/ 中国象棋/ 中國象棋
description: The most popular Chinese board game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: SW 26010 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
